location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from George Forster Sadleir, to The Officer in Charge of the Bushire Residency

mods.abstract: In the letter Sadleir writes with reference to a previous letter sent to the Residency, that he fears may not have arrived. Sadleir therefore repeats his request in this letter: to discontinue the part wages to the families of those servants that accompanied him in his journey through Arabia, and to send an account of his disbursements made during his mission.
